client_description.Summary Note:
Alma Katrine Mikkelsen and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Copenhagen. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Alma Katrine Mikkelsen is a 22 year old and comes from Denmark.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
client_description.Family Background: Alma Katrine Mikkelsen is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description.Education Background: Alma obtained her secondary school diploma from Struer Statsgymnasium in 2022.
client_description.Occupation History:
Alma Katrine Mikkelsen is a 22 year old and comes from Denmark.
Alma Katrine Mikkelsen did not start her professional career yet.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
She did not save any money from her earnings.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited a significant sum of 16670000 DKK from her grandmother, a respected Tech Entrepreneur, in 2018, which she has wisely invested.
client_description.Client Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
